message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. I'm willing to negotiate in the next round if you're not happy with this.
You're starting strong, but I think I can do better. I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time.
Let's be reasonable. Inflation is hitting us both, so I think a 50/50 split is the fairest option right now.  We can avoid further losses this way.
